title: Bonus Ep - Fox’s Prodigal Son Special!
description: In a special presentation for Fox’s new drama Prodigal Son, Karen and Georgia cover the cases of Sante Kimes and Dolly Oesterreich. Plus, an interview with star Bellamy Young!
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
